examples.prompt: A slide featuring artistic, decorative shapes framing neatly arranged textual information styled as an elegant infographic. At the very center, the title "Habits for Emotional Wellbeing" appears clearly, surrounded by a symmetrical floral pattern. On the left upper section, "Practice Mindfulness" appears next to a minimalist lotus flower icon, with the short sentence, "Be present, observe without judging, accept without resisting".
